comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: Some confusion about the middle initial here... Oakley C. Curtis (March 29, 1865 - February 22, 1924) was an American politician and the 50th Governor of Maine.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: See blainehouse.org/governors/Oakley_C_Curtis.html which uses the same photo -- on the website for the official residence of governors of Maine.
